MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Ruthin and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a ground overhead cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35PM on 26th December 2020.
